Docs.param: The name of the SchemaRegistry group.
The name of the schema.
The serialization format of the schema.
The string representation of the schema's content.
The cancellation token for the operation.
Docs.summary: Registers a schema with the SchemaRegistry service. If the schema did not previously exist in the Schema Registry instance, it is added to the instance and assigned a schema ID. If the schema did previous exist in the Schema Registry instance, a new version of the schema is added to the instance and assigned a new schema ID.
